name: rollmean
label: Rollmean
description: The implementation of the moving average with the rollmean function from ikats

inputs.name: dsname
inputs.label: DSname
inputs.description: The name of the dataset where rollmean is applied

parameters.name: window_period
parameters.description: The duration of the sliding window (in ms). Mutually exclusive with the parameter 'Window size'
parameters.label: Window period

parameters.name: window_size
parameters.description: The size of the sliding window (in number of points). Mutually exclusive with the parameter 'Window period'
parameters.label: Window size

parameters.name: alignment
parameters.description: The result alignment ('left' coded by 1,'center' coded by 2,'right' coded by 3), optional value, default is 2
parameters.label: Alignment

outputs.name: result
outputs.label: TS list
outputs.description: The reference to the TS resulting from the rollmean operation: note that dict result is filled only with the key 'tsuid': the 'funcId' is undefined in current version.
